title: Cold War policies for US and Soviet Union

content.question: All of the following were policies pursued by both the United States and the Soviet Union during the Cold War EXCEPT

choices.label: reliance on military alliances for national security
promotion of proxy wars in other states
centralized planning of the national economy

content.answer: centralized planning of the national economy

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
